original_text:
**INSTITUTION
CRITICAL CARE MEDICINE
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN PROGRESS NOTE
PATIENT NAME :
**NAME[AAA , BBB M]
ACCOUNT # :
**ID-NUM
**ROOM
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN :
**NAME[YYY M ZZZ]
ADMISSION DATE :
**DATE[Jan 12 2008]
EVALUATION DATE :
**DATE[Jan 15 08]
PROCEDURE ( S ):
INTUBATION .
INDICATIONS :
Cardiopulmonary arrest for airway protection and for oxygenation and ventilation .
The patient was positioned appropriately .
Using MAC four blade , a size eight endotracheal tube was placed without difficulty .
The patient has positive bilateral breath sounds and positive CO2 detection .
The tube was secured at 23 cm at the lips .
The procedure was done by the Critical Care Medicine fellow .
I was present for the whole entire procedure and directly supervised him .
___________________________________
**NAME[VVV M. CCC] , M.D. , M.P.H.
